title: First Papal Interview on AI and Human Dignity
subtitle: Leo XIV: Citizen of the World, Missionary of the 21st Century
description: In his first sit-down interview, Pope Leo XIV warns it will be difficult to discover God in AI, rejects AI avatar proposal, discusses deepfakes and wealthy investors ignoring human value.

title: Address to Media Representatives
subtitle: On Communication, Peace, and Artificial Intelligence
description: Pope Leo XIV's first major address to global media on communication responsibility, technology, AI, and truthful reporting in the digital age.

title: Message to UN AI for Good Summit
subtitle: Call for Global AI Governance and Human Dignity
description: Pope Leo XIV calls for coordinated global AI governance, emphasizing AI cannot replicate moral discernment or genuine relationships.

title: First Address to Cardinals on AI Challenge
subtitle: Identifying AI as Crucial Issue for Humanity
description: Pope Leo XIV identifies AI as crucial challenge, explains choosing papal name to address new industrial revolution of artificial intelligence.

title: Address to Tech Executives at Vatican
subtitle: Meeting with Google, OpenAI, Meta, and Other Tech Leaders
description: Pope Leo XIV tells leaders from Google, OpenAI, Anthropic, IBM, Meta and Palantir that AI must respect human dignity - people are creatures, not algorithms.

title: Virtual Pope Rejected: AI Concerns Explained
subtitle: Why the Pope Refused an AI Avatar Proposal
description: Pope Leo XIV explains rejecting AI avatar proposal, discusses job displacement concerns and crisis of meaningful work in the AI age.
